name: Hex Relay
description:
Hex Relay is a game where you will face critical challenges to finish each level. Ricochet your way through the multiple stages to end the puzzling circuits. Completing challenges unlocks new circuits to keep the gameplay more fresh, exciting and difficult. Race to the checkpoints to reveal the finish lines within the allotted time by controlling the jumping Hexagon. Don't forget to collect any stars present within specific stages, as they are also vital to unlocking the new content that awaits you!

Originally made for mobile devices and released in 2019.
